body_html:
@yydxlv tensorflow.models has been moved to a separate github repository

You can clone this locally,and move the models folder into your tensorflow folder (found in python site packages ). After that you will have tensorflow.models in your import working correctly. Also if you still have problems with getting data_utils and seq2seq_model not importing from rnn.translate, you can move those files out and rearrange a bit of code in the translate.py to make everthing work. I also had the same problem when starting out, and this was the workaround I used.

Hope it helps!
